notes: Use the harmonised GWAS summary statistics file 29892016-GCST006085-EFO_0001663-build37.f.tsv.gz from the GWAS Catalog (study GCST006085).

Use the hg19 recombination map hapMapRelease24CombinedRecombMap.bw (provided in input_data/) via locuszoomr::link_recomb; do not query UCSC or any online resource at runtime.
